com.ducksonflame.dynablaster

Class PowerUp

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ducksonflame.dynablaster.PowerUp

  • public class PowerUp
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing logic for creating Power Ups. Modifiable settings contain chances for different powerUps.
    Chance for bombsUp is calculated as 1 - (rangeChance + speedChance)

    PowerUp knows its type and allows character to get it via a getter method. Player interaction implemented in the Player class.
